DOC.brief_summary: This study carry see dapagliflozin addition metformin decrease body weight , compare metformin alone .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Effect Dapagliflozin Combination With Metformin Body Weight Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes Ongoing treatment metformin stable dose ≥1500 mg/day least 12 week prior enrolment Inadequate glycemic control , define HbA1c ≥6.5 % ≤8.5 % ≥30 year males ≥55 year females Type 1 Diabetes Body weight change > 5 % within 3 month prior enrolment Renal liver impairment
